duties_responsibilities.duty: Serves customers quickly, accurately, efficiently, and confidentially according to the bank's service standards.
Identifies customer needs and expectations by listening for clues and seeks the opportunity to expand customer relationships by making referrals.

Processes transactions for savings, checking, and loan accounts, maintains a neat and orderly work area, cashes checks, and processes savings withdrawals within assigned limits and in accordance with prescribed procedures.
Balances transactions on a daily basis, knows and follows policies and procedures in completing transactions, minimizing operational errors, and maintains a proper workflow.
Demonstrates expertise and quality performance in all levels of the Teller job function as well as demonstrated leadership skills.
Assists in guiding and training new tellers, coaching and mentoring other tellers, and performs additional branch operational responsibilities including vault and cash management duties.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma, Previous banking experience preferred, good interpersonal skills, good computer skills, ability to read, write, speak, and understand English
